explanations.deep learning: The paper mentions the use of deep learning text analysis algorithms based on the Bi-directional Long Short-Term Memory (Bi-LSTM) model to analyze online information for market sentiments.
explanations.neural network: The paper refers to stochastic neural networks-based algorithms designed to solve the proposed BPSM model.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper specifically uses a Bi-directional Long Short-Term Memory (Bi-LSTM) model for text analysis to obtain market sentiments.
explanations.LSTM: The paper uses a Bi-directional LSTM (Bi-LSTM) model as part of its deep learning text analysis approach.
